<< flip elementary functions fliplr >>

flipdim

Flip array along specified dimension

Syntax

B = flipdim(A, dim)

Input argument

A

an array

dim

an positive integer value

Output argument

B

flipped array.

Description

flipdim return an new array of A flipped about the dimension dim.

flipdim is similar to flip and available for compatibility with old existing scripts.

Example

x = eye(3, 2);
y = flipdim(x, 1)
y = flipdim(x, 2)
y = flipdim(x, 3)

See also

flip, flipud, fliplr.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
